TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TokenFilterName extends Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.ExtensibleEnum`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.TokenFilterName>
Public NotInheritable Class TokenFilterName Inherits ExtensibleEnum(Of TokenFilterName)

Docs.summary: Defines the names of all token filters supported by Azure Search.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Apostrophe As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Strips all characters after an apostrophe (including the apostrophe itself).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ArabicNormalization As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: A token filter that applies the Arabic normalizer to normalize the orthography.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AsciiFolding As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Converts alphabetic, numeric, and symbolic Unicode characters which are not in the first 127 ASCII characters (the "Basic Latin" Unicode block) into their ASCII equivalents, if such equivalents exist.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CjkBigram As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Forms bigrams of CJK terms that are generated from StandardTokenizer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CjkWidth As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Normalizes CJK width differences. Folds fullwidth ASCII variants into the equivalent basic Latin, and half-width Katakana variants into the equivalent Kana.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Classic As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Removes English possessives, and dots from acronyms.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CommonGram As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Construct bigrams for frequently occurring terms while indexing. Single terms are still indexed too, with bigrams overlaid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.TokenFilterName Create(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create (name As String) As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Creates a new TokenFilterName instance, or returns an existing instance if the given name matches that of a known token filter.
Docs.returns: A TokenFilterName instance with the given name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly EdgeNGram As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Generates n-grams of the given size(s) starting from the front or the back of an input token.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Elision As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Removes elisions. For example, "l'avion" (the plane) will be converted to "avion" (plane).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly GermanNormalization As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Normalizes German characters according to the heuristics of the German2 snowball algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HindiNormalization As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Normalizes text in Hindi to remove some differences in spelling variations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IndicNormalization As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Normalizes the Unicode representation of text in Indian languages.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly KeywordRepeat As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Emits each incoming token twice, once as keyword and once as non-keyword.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly KStem As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: A high-performance kstem filter for English.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Length As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Removes words that are too long or too short.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Limit As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Limits the number of tokens while indexing.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Lowercase As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Normalizes token text to lower case.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly NGram As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Generates n-grams of the given size(s).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig specialname class Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.TokenFilterName op_Implicit(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Widening Operator CType (name As String) As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Defines implicit conversion from string to TokenFilterName.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly PersianNormalization As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Applies normalization for Persian.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Phonetic As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Create tokens for phonetic matches.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly PorterStem As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Uses the Porter stemming algorithm to transform the token stream.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Reverse As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Reverses the token string.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ScandinavianFoldingNormalization As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Folds Scandinavian characters åÅäæÄÆ->a and öÖøØ->o. It also discriminates against use of double vowels aa, ae, ao, oe and oo, leaving just the first one.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ScandinavianNormalization As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Normalizes use of the interchangeable Scandinavian characters.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Shingle As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Creates combinations of tokens as a single token.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Snowball As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: A filter that stems words using a Snowball-generated stemmer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SoraniNormalization As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Normalizes the Unicode representation of Sorani text.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Stemmer As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Language specific stemming filter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Stopwords As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Removes stop words from a token stream.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Trim As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Trims leading and trailing whitespace from tokens.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Truncate As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Truncates the terms to a specific length.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Unique As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Filters out tokens with same text as the previous token.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Uppercase As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Normalizes token text to upper case.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly WordDelimiter As TokenFilterName

Docs.summary: Splits words into subwords and performs optional transformations on subword groups.
